document.full_text: the white house on thursday pressed congress to pass strong cybersecurity measures to protect consumers' personal information and safeguard the nation's financial system and electric power grid from potentially devastating attacks.
document.title: obama presses congress on cybersecurity measures
lines_and_colors: the white house on thursday pressed congress to pass strong cybersecurity measures to protect consumers' personal information and safeguard the nation's financial system and electric power grid from potentially devastating attacks.
